blackjack.logic

Class BlackjackLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.logic.BlackjackLogic

  • public class BlackjackLogic
extends Object
    This class is the main game logic class. BlackjackLogic keeps track of all players, the shoe etc. and takes care of dealing cards, deciding the winners and so on.
    Author:
    Jari Avikainen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlackjackLogic(int numAIs, int numDecks, int startingMoney)
      Generate a new instance of BlackjackLogic using given parameters as the settings for the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlackjackLogic

        public BlackjackLogic(int numAIs,
                      int numDecks,
                      int startingMoney)
        Generate a new instance of BlackjackLogic using given parameters as the settings for the game. Players are generated and added to ArrayList players Players according to the order in which they will play their hands.
        Parameters:
        numAIs - The amount of AI players participating in the game. Allowed values are 0, 1 and 2.
        numDecks - Number of 52-card decks to be shuffled together into the shoe.
        startingMoney - Amount of starting money given to the players.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerHand

        public Hand getPlayerHand(Player player)
        Returns the hand belonging to the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose hand will be returned.
        Returns:
        The current hand of cards belonging to the given player.

      • adjustBets

        public void adjustBets(int userBet)
        Requests each of the players to set their bet for the next round. The bet chosen by the user is passed to the players as an argument.
        Parameters:
        userBet - The new bet chosen by the user.

      • deal

        public void deal()
        Deals two cards to each of the players and the dealer.

      • dealCard

        public void dealCard(Player player)
        Deals one card to the player given as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to which the new card is dealt.

      • getNextPlayer

        public Player getNextPlayer()
        Returns the Player whose turn it is to play.
        Returns:
        Player whose turn it is at the moment or null, if all the players (including the dealer) have played their turn.

      • playAIHand

        public void playAIHand(Player player)
        Instructs the AI player given as a parameter to play its turn. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if The Player given is not an AI.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player that should play its turn.

      • getPlayers

        public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()

      • getDealerHand

        public Hand getDealerHand()
        Returns the dealer's hand.
        Returns:
        The dealer's hand.

      • payWinnings

        public void payWinnings()
        Goes through all of the players, evaluates their hands compared to the dealer, and adjusts the player's money according to the results. Hands are cleared after resolving them.
